parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end time of querying the slow query execution.
The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

parameters.name: ReturnSqlText
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return the SQL text.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The start time of querying the slow query execution.
The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.
